title: Where music and code meet
intro-p1: I'm a frontend engineer with a music teaching background, currently exploring whether AI can understand what makes film soundtracks effective. It's equal parts technical challenge and musical curiosityâ€”and I'm learning that the gap between human intuition and computational analysis is fascinating.
intro-p2: When I'm not coding, you'll find me analyzing
intro-p2-2: Italian and German streaks alive, or making dumplings
intro-p3: I'm exploring whether the intersection of music and tech is where I belong. If you're working in this space or thinking about similar questions, I'd love to hear from you.
